label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml: • Aphotic Shieldcast range increased from 350 to 450

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml: • Armor reduced from 4 to 2

label: Anti-Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Base attack time improved from 1.45 to 1.35
    • (Hero attack rate improves the lower the Base Attack Time is)

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 1
  • Battle Hungerdamage per second rescaled from 15/17/25/33 to 15/21/27/33

label: Bane
descriptionHtml:
• Brain Sapcooldown decreased from 16 to 14
  • Fiend's Gripnow gives vision of the target
  • Enfeeblenow reduces attack damage by a constant amount

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml: • Armor reduced by 1

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• GreaterHawkinvisibility fade time decreased from 8 to 5 seconds
  • Wild Axesnow move at similar speed to the max range (so it isn't as slow for short range targeting)
  • Added Aghanim's Scepter upgrade
    • Increases cast range from 600 to 950
    • Decreases cooldown from 80/75/70 to 45

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml: • Blood Bathassist AoE increased from 200 to 225

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75
  • Jinadacooldown decreased from 15/12/9/6 to 12/10/8/6

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Drunken Hazeduration increased from 7 to 8 seconds
  • Primal SplitEarthpanda now carries the hero's auras around him
    • If you are carryingRadianceorAssault Cuirassfor example, the area around your panda is affected

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml: • Warpathdamage per stack increased from 4/8/12 to 10/15/20

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed increased from 300 to 305
  • Double Edgecooldown decreased from 12 to 10
  • Hoof Stompcooldown decreased from 15 to 13

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Base strength increased by 3
  • Chaos Boltdamage improved from 1-200 to 1-200/50-225/75-250/100-275
  • Chaos Bolt now has a floating text indicator for the damage done

label: Chen
descriptionHtml: • Test of Faithsecondary ability to teleport units is now a part ofHoly Persuasioninstead

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml: • Armor reduced by 1

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml: • Freezing Fieldlevel 1 mana cost decreased from 300 to 200

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Wall of Replicaillusion damage improved from 70% to 70/80/90%
  • Added an Aghanim's Scepter upgrade (and visual effect)
    • Creates illusions of allied heroes as well as enemy heroes
    • Allied illusions deal 50% damage

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml: • Poison Touchdamage increased from 7/14/21/28 to 8/16/24/32

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75
  • Witchcraftbonuses rescaled to be more straightforward

label: Doom
descriptionHtml: • Doomduration decreased from 14 to 13 seconds (Aghanim's Doom is still 14)

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml: • Breathe Firedamage rescaled from 75/150/225/300 to 90/170/240/300

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml: • Previous sight range nerf reverted (from 6.68)

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml: • Echo Slaminitial damage reduced from 165/230/285 to 160/210/270

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Ancestral Spiritnow has a secondary ability that returns the spirit
  • Ancestral Spirit cooldown decreased from 19 to 16
  • Ancestral Spirit cast range increased from 1000 to 1200

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml: • Aghanim'sImpetusrange bonus increased from +150 extra to +165

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75
  • Aghanim's upgradedChronospherecooldown decreased from 75 to 60
  • Chronosphere now revealsInvisibleunits
  • Chronosphere cast range improved from 500/550/600 to 600
  • Time Walkslow affects all units along his path, instead of just at the destination

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• Agility growth increased from 2.4 to 2.8
  • Rocket Barragecooldown rescaled from 6.5 to 7/6.5/6/5.5 seconds
  • Added an Aghanim's Scepter upgrade (and visual effect)
    • Call Downnow has a global cast range and the second rocket does 75 more damage

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Burning Spearsminimum HP requirement removed (it is still non-lethal)
  • Life Breakcast mechanism changed
    • It now has a 600 cast range and causes Huskar to quickly dash forward towards the target
    • You are magic immune while running forward
    • If you get interrupted, the dash stops

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• No longer gets interrupted by casting orbs or invoke
  • Base damage reduced by 5
  • Alacritycan now target mechanical units
  • Alacrity mana cost increased from 50 to 100
  • Alacrity bonus damage & attack speed decreased from 30➜90 to 20➜80
  • Cold Snapnow requires a minimum of 10 damage before it triggers
  • Ice Wallno longer affects magic immune units
  • TheInvokecombinations are now displayed in the ability tooltip
  • Fixed some issues with how Invoke tracks your recently casted spells
    • It now always remembers the latest invoke spell even if it is one you already have
    • So if you have two and want to keep the oldest one, you can recast it and it will consider it the newest one

label: Io
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased from 33-42 to 43-52
  • Attack range increased from 525 to 575
  • Tethermovement speed bonus reduced from 15/20/25/30% to 20%
  • Tether stun duration rebalanced from 1/1.25/1.5/1.75 to 0.75/1.25/1.75/2.25
  • SpiritsOscillation subabilities no longer interrupt Wisp's movement
  • Spirits now circle slightly faster when there are fewer alive
  • Spirits no longer slow
  • Spirits life duration increased by 3 seconds
  • Spirits now spawn over 4 second interval instead of 6
  • Overcharge Reworked

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml: • MacropyreAoE increased from 200 to 225

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75
  • Blade Dancecritical strike chance rescaled from 10/20/25/35% to 15/20/25/35%

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• Ghost Shipstun increased from 1 to 1.2 seconds
  • Tidebringercooldown rescaled from 16/12/8/4 to 13/10/7/4

label: Lich
descriptionHtml: • Dark Ritualcooldown rescaled from 30/27/24/21 to 35/30/25/20

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedInfest
    • Can now be cast on allied heroes, dealing AoE damage when Lifestealer bursts out

label: Lina
descriptionHtml: • Aghanim'sLaguna Bladecast range increased from 600 to 900

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml: • Spirit BearDemolishdecreased from 60% to 40% bonus damage versus buildings

label: Luna
descriptionHtml: • Lunar Blessingrescaled from 8/16/24/32 to 14/20/26/32

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml:
• Lycan Wolvesmove speed increased from 400 to 400/420/440/460
  • Wolves collision size reduced a bit

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml:
• Cast point reduced
  • Empowercast range increased from 500 to 800
  • Skewernumber of enemy units dragged rescaled from 2 to 1/2/3/4

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml:
• Added an Aghanim's Scepter upgrade
    • Creates an extra clone once the item is acquired
    • Please note that the item is undroppable once the clone is created

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml:
• Armor reduced by 2
  • Replicatenow has a visual time (player only) that counts down its duration
  • Morphnow has a visual effect
    • Shows one visual effect for transforming agility, and another one for strength
    • This effect can be seen by both teams

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75
  • Nearby Naga Siren illusions now play theEnsnareanimation
  • Critical Strike replaced withRip Tide

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Wrath of Naturebounce count improved from 12/14/16 to 16
    • Scepter from 14/16/18 to 18

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml:
• Reaper's Scythereworked slightly
    • The HP difference calculation is now processed after the stun duration is over
    • Any damage dealt in between the start of the effect and the end is included in the final damage dealt
    • Stun duration reduced from 1.5 to 1

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml:
• Hunter in the Nightmovement bonus rescaled from 15/20/30/35% to 20/25/30/35%
  • Hunter in the Night attack speed bonus rescaled from 20/35/55/75 to 30/45/60/75

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml: • Purificationcast range increased from 400 to 400/500/600/700

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml: • Intelligence growth increased from 2.8 to 3.3

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Icarus Divecooldown decreased from 40 to 30
  • Icarus Dive no longer makes Phoenix spell immune
    • If he is disabled during it, he stops
  • Sun Rayno longer slows
  • Sun Ray damage from 10/20/30/40 + 5% to 15/30/45/60 + 4%
  • Sun Ray turn rate slightly improved
  • Fire Spiritsnow trigger in the area around you and your target when you useTarget Fire Spirits
    • The damage and heal from the two areas do not stack, you are only affected once

label: Pit Lord
descriptionHtml:
• Model size slightly reduced
  • Cast Point decreased from 0.75 to 0.6
  • Dark Riftlevel 1 can now target units
  • Expulsionreworked slightly
    • Expulsion AoE now follows you around and is centered on your hero
    • Expulsion no longer ministuns
    • Expulsion Search AOE increased from 475 to 600
    • Expulsion Damage/Heal increased AOE from 375 to 600
    • Expulsion now heals allies in the area it damages in (for half the amount 10/20/30/40)
  • Pit of Maliceduration decreased from 1.5/2/2.5/3 to 1/1.5/2/2.5
  • Pit of Malice now deals 100 damage when it affects a unit
  • Pit of Malice now creates 5 corpses in the cast area
  • Firestormreworked

label: Puck
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 4
  • Waning Riftsilence duration rebalanced from 0.1/1/2/3 to 0.75/1.5/2.25/3

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml: • Rotdamage increased from 25/50/75/100 to 35/60/85/110

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml: • Sonic Wavedamage rescaled from 290/430/600 to 350/475/600

label: Riki
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75
  • Blink Strikecooldown rescaled from 30/20/10/5 to 20/15/10/5
  • Smoke Screencast range increased from 350 to 425
  • Smoke Screen cooldown decreased from 15 to 13 seconds

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml: • Armor increased by 1

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml:
• Disruptionmana cost increased from 75 to 120
  • Disruption cooldown rescaled from 16 to 25/22/19/16
  • Disruption illusion duration rescaled from 6 to 5/6/7/8
  • Changed Shadow Demon's hero model
    • This was his original model during development
    • The previous model will be used for another hero instead

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 5
  • Ether Shocktarget count rescaled from 3/4/6/7 to 1/3/5/7
  • Ether Shock damage rescaled from 80/160/240/320 to 140/200/260/320
  • Mass Serpent Wardsare now automatically added to your unit selection upon cast
    • Issuing a command to the wards will NOT cause your hero to be interrupted while you are channeling Shackles

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed increased from 290 to 300
  • Curse of the Silentcast range decreased from 900 to 800
  • Glaives of Wisdomcooldown from 2/0/0/0 to 0
  • Last Wordis now muted when Silencer is stunned (previously it was only when silenced)
  • Last Word no longer triggers on Spell-Attacks (Frost Arrows, Burning Spears, etc)
  • Last Word AoE decreased from 900 to 750
  • Last Word now steals a point of intelligence if Silencer gets a killing blow on a hero
    • This is in addition if the hero died within the AoE
    • So if you kill a hero you will steal 2 intelligence points, otherwise you will steal 1

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml: • Amplify Damagearmor reduction increased from 5/10/15 to 8/12/16

label: Slark
descriptionHtml:
• Strength growth increased from 1 to 1.8
  • Intelligence growth increased from 1.6 to 1.9
  • Agility growth reduced from 2 to 1.5
  • Essence Shiftnow reduces each stat by 1 on attacks (no longer reduces the primary by 2)
  • Essence Shift agility bonus reduced from 4 to 3 per attack
  • Essence Shift duration increased from 15/30/45/60 to 15/30/60/120
  • Essence Shift permanently reduces each stat of a hero Slark kills by 1 and he gains 3 Agi permanently
  • Pounceno longer hits non-hero units
  • Pounce AoE increased from 85 to 95
  • Pounce speed fixed to be the same at all levels

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75
  • Greater Bashnow gives a 3 second 15% movement speed bonus whenever you land a bash
  • Charge of DarknessReworked

label: Sven
descriptionHtml: • Great CleaveAoE increased from 175 to 200

label: Techies
descriptionHtml:
• Aghanim'sRemote Minecast range decreased from 900 to 700
  • Land Minelimit increased from 15 to 20
  • Suicide Squad, Attack!now gives Techies XP for kills he gets with it
  • Suicide Squad, Attack! cooldown from 75 to 180/170/160/150
  • Suicide Squad, Attack! now causes Techies death time to be reduced by 50%
  • Detonate All subability of Remote Mine removed
    • Based on Techies player feedback, it was much more commonly used accidentally than for its intended purpose
    • The new focused detonation ability or the group selection detonate fill the role better

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Psi Bladeswidth increased from 70 to 80

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed increased from 300 to 310
  • SunderHP limit now applies to yourself
    • This is an improvement, it will no longer bring you down to the target's HP
    • It will follow the HP percentage restrictions
    • The main application of this is when it is used to heal an ally
  • Sunder cooldown rescaled from 200/120/60 to 160/110/60
  • Metamorphosisreworked

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml: • Anchor Smashreworked

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml: • Heat Seeking Missilenow hits 2 units at all levels

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml: • Tossedallied units no longer take damage (they used to take a portion of the damage)

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• Armor reduced by 1
  • Nature's Guisenow gives the unit a 10% movement speed bonus
  • Nature's Guise keeps the target invisible for up to 1 second after leaving the proximity of a tree, except during the initial cast
  • Nature's Guise cooldown increased from 3 seconds to 10/8/6/4 seconds
  • Overgrowthrebalanced

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml:
• Cast point reduced by 0.3
  • Berserker Ragetransformation time removed (was 0.1 sec)
  • Blind replaced withWhirling Axes

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Shardsnow kills trees around the area it is created
  • Snowballno longer moves faster based on the allies inside of it
    • It used to move at a rate of 1.5× your speed plus 50% of the speed of all allies
    • It now only moves at 1.5× your speed
    • The minimum speed for the snowball is 200

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml:
• Enrageno longer triggers an additional Fury Swipes hit
  • Earthshockdamage increased from 70/120/170/220 to 90/140/190/240
  • Fury Swipesduration increased from 5 to 6 seconds
  • Overpowercast time removed

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Aghanim'sNether Swapcan now target creeps

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml: • Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 0.75

label: Viper
descriptionHtml: • Corrosive Skinnow stacks with Poison Attack

label: Visage
descriptionHtml:
• Base Strength decreased from 25 to 22
  • Strength growth increased from 2.2 to 2.4
  • Soul Assumptionmana cost rescaled from 150 to 200/180/160/140
  • FamiliarsHP improved from 300/400/500 to 300/450/600

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Fatal Bondslink count increased from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6
  • Fatal Bonds casting range increased from 600 to 800
  • Upheavalcooldown decreased from 65 to 50

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml:
• Armor reduced by 1
  • The Swarmdamage rescaled from 21/24/27/30 to 15/20/25/30

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml: • Shackleshotcooldown increased from 10 to 12 seconds

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml: • Death Wardis automatically added to your unit selection upon cast

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• Reincarnationnow does a 700 AoE 3 second 30% slow around the area where he respawns
  • Reincarnation delay decreased from 5/4.5/4 to 3 seconds

label: Zeus
descriptionHtml:
• Arc Lightningcooldown decreased from 2.25 to 2
  • Arc Lightning mana cost improved from 65/72/79/87 to 65/70/75/80

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml: • Added a new item to the Arcane Sanctum shop (Veil of Discord)

label: Courier
descriptionHtml:
• Added a short cooldown on Courier and Flying Courier recipe buying to prevent accidental double buys
  • Minimap indicator is now shown at the location where a courier dies
  • Resume Delivery ability added, upon use the courier will resume its previous deliver action
    • For example, if it was delivering an item to another player, and you interrupted it to do something, you could then resume it to deliver the items to its previous target

label: Assault Cuirass
descriptionHtml: • Assault Cuirass recipe cost decreased from 1500 to 1300

label: Bloodstone
descriptionHtml:
• Now starts with 5 charges
  • Can no longer be disassembled
    • This is primarily due to the charge change above and preventing abuse

label: Boots of Travel
descriptionHtml:
• Double clicking now teleports you to fountain
  • Towers no longer stop attacking when you teleport to them
  • Creeps no longer stop moving when you teleport to them
    • The unit you are teleporting on still has lowest AI priority

label: Crystalys
descriptionHtml: • Critical Strike chance increased from 15% to 20%

label: Daedalus
descriptionHtml: • Critical Strike chance increased from 20% to 25%

label: Desolator
descriptionHtml: • Corruptioneffect now works onbuildings

label: Diffusal Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Purgecooldown decreased from 12 to 8
  • Purge now removesGhost ScepterGhost Form

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml: • Charges can now be refreshed by buying the recipe

label: Ethereal Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Ether Blastslow increased from 45% to 60%
  • Can now bedisassembled

label: Force Staff
descriptionHtml: • Can no longer push units out ofChronosphere

label: Gem of True Sight
descriptionHtml: • Stock cooldown increased from 6 to 8 minutes

label: Hand of Midas
descriptionHtml: • Hand of Midas now gives a constant amount of gold (190)

label: Healing Salve
descriptionHtml: • Stock cooldown removed

label: Heart of Tarrasque
descriptionHtml: • Melee heroes now only have to wait 4 seconds after taking player damage for the regeneration to activate

label: Maelstrom
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost decreased from 800 to 600

label: Mjollnir
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe cost increased from 400 to 600
  • IAS bonus increased from 70 to 80 to match its components

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml:
• WarriorLast Willdamage rescaled from 200/400/600 to 400/500/600
  • Archer AuraAoE increased to standard aura sizes

label: Orb of Venom
descriptionHtml: • Orb of Venom price decreased from 500 to 450

label: Orchid Malevolence
descriptionHtml: • Soul Burndamage recurrence increased from 20% to 25%

label: Pipe of Insight
descriptionHtml: • Barrierduration increased from 8 to 10

label: Quelling Blade
descriptionHtml: • Can now be sold

label: Refresher Orb
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown decreased from 210 to 160

label: Ring of Basilius
descriptionHtml: • No longer interrupts your hero when toggled

label: Sange
descriptionHtml: • Lesser Maimis no longer an Orb effect

label: Sange and Yasha
descriptionHtml: • Greater Maimis no longer an Orb effect

label: Scythe of Vyse
descriptionHtml: • Mana regeneration decreased from 200% to 150%

label: Shadow Blade
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Walkbonus damage increased from 125 to 150

label: Smoke of Deceit
descriptionHtml:
• Dispel AoE from heroes and towers increased from 850 to 950
  • Stock cooldown increased from 10 to 12 minutes

label: Urn of Shadows
descriptionHtml: • Double clicking will now self-castSoul Release

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Heroes now get XP if they get a kill outside of the standard XP range

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Increased the width of the sentinel ramp between Roshan and the Rune spawn

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutral spawn empty check no longer considers corpses in its spawn rules

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Improved courier deliver movement AI

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added Buyback cost to Observer Scoreboard

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added Nerubian Assassin to CM

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added Shadow Demon to CM

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Rearranged group selection priority when selecting multiple shops

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added new -stats (-st) command that replaces individual hero commands to show stats specific to the hero (replaces -gg, -aa, -int, -mines, -souls, -fs, -ha, -mc)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Rebalanced all Melee heroes between 100 and 128 range to be 128 range

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Flying Courier has a new model (Frost Wyrm)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Animal Courier has a new model (Grunt,It's not easy being green!)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Hellcaller Shockwave damage increased from 100 to 125

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Enemy wards now have a visual effect around them to allow you to more easily distinguish allied wards from enemy wards

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Shops now have an animation (for the player only) when you select them

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fortify Buildings glyph ability now prevents magic damage as well

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added -disablehelp support for Snowball

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new command -msa to display the speed of all your allies

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new debug command -respawn

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Swapped the location of the Intelligence and Agility Taverns

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • -ER (experimental runes) mode reworked, now enables runes spawn in both locations past 40 minutes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Rearranged Observer Scoreboard to make it easier to see the creep stats for a hero

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Improved the ability display for Split Shot toggle

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Clockwerk Goblin now has a visual effect with Aghanim's Scepter

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Invoker now has a visual effect with Aghanim's Scepter

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Thrall's class renamed from Far Seer to Disruptor

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tombstone now has a sound effect when cast

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Rikimaru's Blink Strike has a new special effect

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Craggy Exterior now has a visual effect when it stuns someone

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Omnislash has a new initial cast animation

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Nature's Guise has a new icon

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Refraction now has two status icons to differentiate between attack and defense effects

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Shadowraze has a new visual effect

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Scream of Pain has a new visual effect

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new icon for Fatal Bonds

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Improved Sonic Wave sound and

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Lina's attack old attack projectile is now restored

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Lina's fire hands visual effect have been improved

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new Epicenter visual effect

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new hero icon for Phoenix

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new icon for Overgrowth

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added Greek language support

label: Bug fixes
descriptionHtml:
• Fixed Courier stopping and standing still in the middle of its delivery path if the hero disappears (Astral Imprisonment, Disruption, etc.)
  • Fixed a bug with Phase Boots that could cause Smoke of Deceit invisibility to last a little bit extra after it should be revealed
  • Fixed Scream of Pain not hitting fogged or invisible units
  • Fixed item chest sometimes being hard to click when buying with full inventory at side shops
  • Fixed courier command panel sometimes getting bugged if the courier is carrying certain items
  • Fixed the Collect Items function causing an enemy gem to be teleported back to their base
  • Fixed Flying Courier from being able to right click on a powerup to waste it
  • Fixed Natural Order and Ice Vortex interaction with spell resistance items
  • Fixed Buyback wasting gold and cooldown if used while reviving with Aegis
  • Fixed creep spawn count increase timer starting from game load rather than creep spawn
  • Fixed Impetus damage cap reverting it to zero instead of remaining at the cap at long distances
  • Fixed Shackleshot not stunning the secondary target if it went into fog while the projectile was flying
  • Fixed deaths during Primal Split from counting as suicides
  • Fixed the selection type for Mass Serpent Wards, Death Ward and Plague Wards so they behave like normal units from UI
  • Fixed a rare bug that sometimes caused level 1-3 of Necromastery to be a little higher than its max
  • Fixed Blur triggering on heroes with an invisibility buff
  • Fixed a bug with TB disappearing from map
  • Fixed Sun Ray continuing while reincarnating with Aegis
  • Fixed Plasma Field AoE damage not hitting invisible units
  • Fixed Desolator against Swarm units
  • Fixed Desolator against Seeking Missile
  • Fixed Overcharge sometimes turning off by itself
  • Fixed some rare bugs with Time Walk that could cause it to jump much further
  • Fixed a bug with Phase Boots and Spectral Dagger
  • Fixed a rare visual glitch possible with Dream Coil
  • Fixed Pudge being unable to cast Meat Hook when Ethereal
  • Fixed a bug with how Stone Gaze levels up
  • Fixed a bug with how the slow on Demonic Purges levels up
  • Fixed Charge of Darkness using up Linken's Sphere but continuing anyways
  • Fixed Meat Hook from wasting Linken's Sphere
  • Fixed Laser's blind effect not getting removed by Dark Pact
  • Fixed Jinada charge getting wasted on structures
  • Fixed Armlet sometimes draining extra HP when you interact with your inventory
  • Fixed Smoke of Deceit from getting temporarily applied if enemies were already in range
  • Fixed being able to buy smoke and gem at enemy base
  • Fixed Lifestealer continuing to lose HP via Armlet while he is infesting a unit
  • Fixed some rare bugs with Juggernaut becoming permanently magic immune and silenced
  • Fixed a bug with RD that allowed you to make the heroes move
  • Fixed some edges in the Roshan area where you could place a ward
  • Fixed Gem allied visual effect sometimes not showing up
  • Fixed Urn of Shadows ignoring Linken's Sphere
  • Fixed Ethereal Blade ignoring Linken's Sphere
  • Fixed Primal Roar not being blocked properly by Linken's Sphere
  • Fixed Waveform sometimes moving a little further than it should
  • Added safety code to Nether Strike preventing cases that teleported SB into the enemy fountain
  • Time Lapse now starts remembering locations when Weaver is picked instead of when it is skilled
  • Fixed lots of old tooltip inconsistencies
